title: Vinayak Moitra
description: Vinayak Moitra is a Senior Consultant leading the Value Engineering practice at Aviso. He has an MBA degree in Finance and Marketing has served more than four years in the SaaS industry donning various hats ranging from Value Selling to Customer Success. He is an avid sports enthusiast and loves to explore new cuisines as a hobby.

title: Asha McElfish
description: Asha McElfish is currently the Director of Customer Adoption, and oversees a global team of product adoption specialists at Aviso. She joins us from Salesforce and Tableau, with a broad background in renewals sales, customer success, and product adoption. Asha is a native Texan and hails from Austin, where she enjoys bike rides, kayaking and walks with her cat, George.

title: Bithika Bishesh
description: Bithika Bishesh is the Manager of Research & Content at Aviso. Since earning her PhD degree in Economics, Bithika has spent half a decade writing on AI and ML advancements. Her work has been published in several international peer-reviewed journals. Bithika is an avid reader, and in her free time she enjoys yoga, and biking.

title: Rohit Kumar
description: Rohit is the Director for Value Sales at Aviso and is passionate about helping customers and prospects understand the value of Aviso solutions. He has 15+ years of experience in sales enablement and value selling roles across organizations like Oracle, EY, Cigna, and FedEx.

title: Rahul Kumar
description: Rahul is a passionate content marketer with several years of experience in content strategy and technology research. Prior to Aviso, Rahul worked with Gartner at a senior level research analyst role, and worked on research pieces for software markets such as CRM, ERP and healthcare.

title: Amit Pande
description: Amit Pande is the EVP of Strategy & Growth and the CMO at Aviso. Amit joined Aviso in the summer of 2019 to take Aviso in a bold new product and go-to-market direction with AI. Amit previously led Marketing and Product teams at companies like Tact.ai, HP, Yahoo, and Oracle. He is a coffee and graphic novels lover and a volunteer with the Stanford Alumni Consulting Team for pro bono support of local Bay Area non-profits.

title: Trevor Rodrigues-Templar
description: Trevor Rodrigues-Templar is the President & CEO of Aviso. He joined Aviso in the summer of 2019 to take Aviso in a bold new direction, building on Aviso's strong heritage in predictive AI forecasting. Trevor was formerly the CRO of Tact.ai. At Salesforce and Oracle, he rewrote their enterprise selling playbooks including once closing 1400% of quota. Trevor is an auto-didact, game theorist, chess and Go player, and a lifelong Stoic.

title: Jane Lambert
description: Jane Lambert is a Go-to-Market Intern with Aviso. Jane is currently a third-year student at the Michael G. Foster School of Business at the University of Washington, Seattle. She is pursuing a Bachelors in Business Administration, with a focus in Information Systems, and Operations & Supply Chain Management.

title: Leela Chaitanya
description: Experienced in Business Process & Risk Consulting, Marketing with a demonstrated history of working in multiple industries.

title: Sriram Kothandaraman
description: Sriram is a product management and marketing manager at Aviso and is responsible for developing, implementing, and executing strategic product marketing plans. He is passionate about messaging, writing, and UX.

title: Austin Twamugabo
description: Austin is a social media/marketing intern for Aviso. He has a key role in writing Avisoâ€™s social media posts on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn as well as developing graphics for such posts.

title: Ketan Pathki
description: Ketan is the VP for Marketing at Aviso and is passionate about all things marketing and growth. He has 15 years of experience in building both revenue and brand for companies in IT, from start-ups to large enterprises like Google and IBM.

title: Georgia Higgins
description: Georgia is an entrepreneurial spirit that uses her love of entrepreneurship to apply creative thinking to find unique solutions. Georgia is a marketing intern here at Aviso AI, increasing social media engagement through the creation of targeted graphics and content that gets published weekly.

title: Jennifer Wang
description: Jennifer is a UCSB Communications graduate with a minor in Art and Philosophy. She spent just shy of a year as a marketing intern at Aviso and is now attending Northwestern Medill, where she is pursuing her Masters in Integrated Marketing Communications.
